rows.label: tlk45320153_01_msg0002
rows.name:
This right here may be the best vantage
point in all Superbia. You can see the
whole of the Divine Beast's right shoulder.

rows.label: tlk45320153_01_msg0003
rows.name:
When monsters approach, we send 'em
flying with the cannons in Grian, Wing
Area #2, which you came here through.

rows.label: tlk45320153_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It's me and my comrade's job
to keep watch every day and
make sure nothing seems amiss.

rows.label: tlk45320153_01_msg0005
rows.name:
By the way, that comrade I mentioned
is always slacking off somewhere. So
I basically keep watch on my own.
